page.title: 01OUR "D" BLOCK - N.LOWESTOFT
page.content: Our D.Block is one of mainly residential area to the south and east and rural to the north and west. The coastal strip has sea defences in the southern half and open beach and cliffs to the north. The area contains both high schools for the north of Lowestoft, also several other middle, primary, infant and private schools are situated here mainly to the south amid the residential areas. The holiday industry is mainly served by Gunton Holiday Camp to the north-east, and camping and caravan parks along the coastal strip. As our D.Block is situated to the north of Lowestoft it is served by a few community shops and fewer businesses and industries.
